Sybille Berg und Gila Lustiger . It is focused on body representations in contemporary
German novels. In this prose body images are diﬀerent to those we are used to from
magazines, commercials and digital media. The reader is confronted with images of
illness, age and injuries instead of perfectly styled, healthy, juvenile bodies. Analysing

The study is mainly motivated by the question how the literary body images are related
